Note there is no string interpolation or guessing what shape the path should be in. All of that is handled by the router. We only have to provide the data for the user and book ids, and the router takes care of the rest. If we make a change to the

, such as recognizing the singular form “/user/:userId/book/:bookId”, then all paths will automatically be updated. We will not need to search the code base to replace “users” with “user” and “books” with “book”.
